i.name: Stone Skin
i.description: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.

q.name: Crushing Blow
q.description: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.

w.name: Decoy
w.description: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.

e.name: Nimbus Strike
e.description: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.

r.name: Cyclone
r.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.

riot.name: Stone Skin
riot.description: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.

i1.name: Stone Skin
i1.blurb: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Wukong''' gains {{pp|3|showtype=true|4 to 8|1 to 13}} '''bonus''' {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|magic resistance}}}} for each {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy {{tip|champion}} nearby.

riot.name: Crushing Blow
riot.description: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
riot.tooltip: Wukong's next attack gains {{ e4 }} range, deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleAD> bonus physical damage and reduces the enemy's Armor by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

q1.name: Crushing Blow
q1.blurb: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong's''' next [[basic attack]] within 5 seconds gains {{sti|range|125 '''bonus''' range}}, deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} and reduces {{sti|armor|{{as|his target's armor}}}} for 3 seconds.
q1.leveling:
{{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|10 to 130}} {{as|(+ {{ap|0 to 40}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Armor Reduction|{{as|{{ap|10 to 30}}% of target's armor}}}}
notes: * The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* As with most on-hit physical damage, the bonus damage from this ability will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
* This will trigger upon structures and wards (save for the debuff).

* {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parry}} blocks both the damage and the debuff of ''Crushing Blows'', and {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|block}} will block the damage of ''Crushing Blow'' but not the armor reduction.
** {{tip|Blind}} will avoid the damage but will not consume the attack buff.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage and debuff.
* Performing an action after the animation is played, but before dealing damage will start the attack timer, and you must wait before you attack again, although the buff is not lost.

riot.name: Decoy
riot.description: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
riot.tooltip:
Wukong becomes Invisible for {{ e2 }} seconds, leaving behind a decoy that will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies near it after {{ e2 }} seconds.

Stealth - Invisible: Wukong can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

w1.name: Decoy
w1.blurb: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong''' is pushed {{tt|100|Estimated}} units away, entering {{tip|invisibility}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and leaving behind a [[Champion summoned units#decoys|decoy]] of himself.
w1.description2: After {{fd|1.5}} seconds, the decoy performs a circular attack around itself for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all nearby enemies before disappearing.
notes: * If the decoy is killed before it vanishes, it will not deal any damage.

riot.name: Nimbus Strike
riot.description: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
riot.tooltip: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies nearby. Each enemy struck takes {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAD> physical damage. Wukong then gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

e1.name: Nimbus Strike
e1.blurb: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong''' {{tip|dashes}} on a cloud to the target enemy and sends out images to attack up to two additional enemies near the primary target, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to each enemy struck.
e1.description2: Upon hitting his target, '''Wukong''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 4 seconds.
notes: * It applies a stack of {{ri|Electrocute}} / {{ri|Phase Rush}} even if the target is untargettable.
* The instant the clones hit they can get be hit by non-targeted attacks or abilities (e.g {{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}; an attack move {{ai|Harsh Lesson|Illaoi}}).

riot.name: Cyclone
riot.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
riot.tooltip:
Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around for 4 seconds, dealing {{ damagepersecondtotal }} physical damage per second to nearby enemies, knocking them up for {{ knockupduration }} second the first time they get hit.

At the start, Wukong gains {{ movespeedbonus*100 }}% Movement Speed, and he gains an additional {{ movespeedpersecond*100 }}% per second over the duration.

r1.name: Cyclone
r1.blurb: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong''' spins his staff around for up to 4 seconds, becomes {{tip|pacify|pacified}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|{{pp|8|type=time active|key=%|5 to 40|0.5 to 4|formula=5% '''bonus''' movement speed every half second. ''This is capped at 4 seconds.''}} '''bonus''' movement speed|ms}}}}. Reactivating ''Cyclone'' cancels it immediately.
r1.description2: The spin deals {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies every second. Enemies affected by ''Cyclone'' for the first time are briefly {{tip|airborne|knocked up}}.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Physical Damage Per Second|{{ap|20 to 200 3}} {{as|(+ 110% AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|20*4 to 200*4 3}} {{as|(+ 440% AD)}}}}
notes: * While spinning, summoner spells and item actives can still be used, with the exception of {{nie|Crescent}}, the active portion of {{ii|Tiamat}}, {{ii|Ravenous Hydra}} and {{ii|Titanic Hydra}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block one second of damage.
